snippet.title: Dad by the Sword - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch as a host of enemies are struck down in this action-packed trailer for Dad by the Sword, an upcoming first-person swordfighter about fatherhood. A demo for Dad by the Sword is available now on Steam.

In Dad by the Sword, one man fights the Anti-Dad monsters of the Post-Dad Dadpocalypse. That man... is your Dad!
